Mailing Address: c/o Kelowna Lioness Club9-3151 Lakeshore Rd, Ste 141Kelowna, BC     V1W 3S9
Service Details: - Contributes to local non-profits and events through fundraising and volunteering- All-female club serves our community by helping with Seniors Bingo, on Canada Day, at Easter Seals Camp Winfield, Freedom's Door, NOW Canada, and for the Heart & Stroke Foundation Big Bike event- Also hosts fundraising events such as bake sales, catering, and our annual Fowl Supper
How to Apply: - We encourage anyone interested in joining to sit in on a meeting or join us in volunteering as our guest to experience the club in action before officially joining- Please contact us for more information on our next meeting date and time
Meetings: - Meetings are on the 1st and 3rd Wed of each month (except July and August) starting at 6:00pm @ Perkins Restaurant (2170 Harvey Ave)- Please call or email in advance, and we will save you a seat
